Name: nya-alhajiyusufmuha
Author: Al Haji Yusuf Muhammad Kanyamula
Source: http://goodwordbooks.com/, Goodword Books, Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa

Translations.Text: Paliusikupamenemdimaumayamba
Ndimasanapamene kumayera
Ndi pali Iye amene adalenga chachimuna ndi chachikazi
Ndithudi zochita zanu zonse zili ndi mapeto osiyana
Akakhala iye amene amapereka chaulere ndipo amamuopa Mulungu
Ndipo amakhulupirira pochita zinthu zabwino
Ife tidzamusalazira njira yake ya ku chipulumutso
Koma iye amene sapereka chaulere ndipo amaganiza kuti ndi woima payekha
Sakhulupirira ndipo sachita ntchito zabwino
Tidzamusalazira njira yake ya ku chionongeko
Kodi chuma chake chidzamuthandiza chiani pamene iye azidzazunzika
Ndithudi ndi udindo wathu kupereka chilangizo
Ndipo, ndithudi, zonse za m’moyo umene uli nkudza ndi za m’moyo uno ndi zathu
Motero ndakuchenjezani za moto wa lawilawi
Kulibe Al-Dhuha	655 munthu amene akapsye nawo kupatula munthu wochita zoipa
Amene amakana choonadi ndipo safuna kumvera chenjezo
Koma anthu onse olungama, adzatalikirana nawo
Amene amapereka chaulere chake poonjezera kudziyeretsa
Osati chifukwa chakuti afuna kupezako cholowa ayi
Kupatula ndi cholinga chopeza chisomo cha Ambuye wake, wapamwamba mwamba
Ndithudi iye adzasangalala
